attributes.action: acknowledge that there is a dis-connect with the electorate and that all spoilt  ballots papers will be shown as a % of the total vote in the upcoming general electionl
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is a great shame that democracy has been undermined by a dis-connect between politicians and the electorate. This should be underlined at the upcoming General Election by the electorate spoiling their ballot papers, and this being shown as a % of the total vote.

rejection.details: We can not accept petitions that ask for the PM to 'acknowledge' something as this is not recognised as a valid call for action. For more information please read the terms and conditions for more information http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/terms
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
